channel.title: Importing Previously Saved Whonix VM Backups?
channel.description: Hello All, For some time I've been running Virtualbox and Whonix on a host PC with Ubuntu 14.04. With Virtualbox I exported backup copies of my Whonix Workstation and Whonix Gateway VMs. If I use Virtualbox to import those saved VMs on a different host PC running Ubuntu 16.04, will the Whonix VMs run o.k.? Thanks.

item.title: Importing Previously Saved Whonix VM Backups?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Can be sorted out as per:

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle

Read full topic
item.source: Importing Previously Saved Whonix VM Backups?
